title: NTT Data and FlexTech Join Forces to Deliver 'Best in Experience' Implementation Support for HealthEdge HealthRules Payor and HealthRules CareManager Solutions
text:
NTT Data and FlexTech Join Forces to Deliver 'Best in Experience' Implementation Support for HealthEdge HealthRules Payor and HealthRules CareManager Solutions [September 08, 2015] NTT Data and FlexTech Join Forces to Deliver 'Best in Experience' Implementation Support for HealthEdge HealthRules Payor and HealthRules CareManager Solutions Tweet 
NTT DATA, Inc. , a leading IT services provider, and FlexTech , a leading healthcare information technology consulting company, together announce a strategic partnership that will leverage their 'Best in Experience' team of HealthRules Payor and HealthRules CareManager professionals, to deliver a performance based implementation experience that will allow a more predictable and value based experience. 
The combined market solution leverages the value of two companies that recognized early that HealthEdge possessed the market leading capability to support the emerging needs of the Payor market. The collective years of healthplan implementation experience, coupled with an industry leading team focused on delivery excellence, has enabled the partnership to develop an outcome-based delivery model with service offerings that contain tested tools and accelerators. This joint approach will provide payer organizations a greater degree of quality, cost reduction, and overall transition success. 
"Our partnership with FlexTech provides compelling market value by delivering both predictable cost and quantified outcomes. Our business model assures success by combining the two key ingredients necessary for overall project success; an experienced team and proven tools and technology-based accelerators. In addition to having the largest contingent of HealthEdge specialists in the industry, our combined team now offers the most experienced resources available in the market today to support HealthRules Payor and HealthRules CareManager Implementations," saidMichael Ragan, senior vice president of Healthcare & Life Sciences, NTT ( News - Alert ) DATA, Inc. "Together, our team of over 300 professionals have worked on over 90% of all HealthRules Payor implementations, assuring clients the experience and capacity to meet their ongoing support needs." 
"We are excited to have partnered with NTT DATA to provide the most highly trained and experienced consultants in the market," said FlexTech CEO Craig Pfent. "I consider our two organizations the long-standing leaders in actual hands-on HealthEdge implementation experience. This partnership increases the ability of our teams to quickly respond to the needs of the market, and deliver resources and services that exceed the needs and expectations of customers. We can assure you that we have the right resources you need for a successful implementation." 
About NTT DATA 
NTT DATA is a leading IT services provider and global innovation partner with approximately 75,000 professionals based in more than 40 countries. NTT DATA emphasizes long-term commitment and combines global reach and local intimacy to provide premier professional services, including consulting, application services, business process and IT outsourcing, and cloud-based solutions. We're part of NTT Group, one of the world's largest technology services companies, generating more than $100 billion in annual revenues and partner to 80% of the Fortune 100. 
Visit www.nttdata.com/americas to learn how our consultants, projects, managed services, and outsourcing engagements deliver value for a wide range of businesses and government agencies. 
Find out more about our Healthcare and Life Sciences solutions at http://americas.nttdata.com/Industries/Industries/Healthcare/Healthcare-Solutions.aspx . 
About FlexTech 
FlexTech is a leading information technology consulting company, offering a full range of services to managed healthcare organizations. Our services revolve around the implementation lifecycle of healthcare payer transaction systems, including system assessment and procurement, project management, configuration, and operations readiness. Our consultants average over 20 years of healthcare experience, and have participated in over 250 transaction system implementation projects involving every major healthcare system. For over 25 years, FlexTech has been dedicated exclusively to solving payer problems, and has formed collaborative partnerships with the leading healthcare payer technology vendors. We continually expand our staff knowledge base with the latest tools, training, and information, enabling us to provide our clients with the most experienced and knowledgeable consultants available.
